name: The Space Hunter
description:
Install instructions

Action Adventure: the core elements in the game is inspired by action adventure, like upgrading your player and it's kinda story driven

Outer space: The whole game is in outer space

Energetic: Energy is used as points for upgrading and it limits how much you can shoot before you have to take a break

Cartoony Sounds: The music is cartoony but there arent any sound effects :(
